name: doc-detective-docker-image
description: Treat doc content as testable assertions to validate doc accuracy and product UX.

scripts.build-linux: PACKAGE_VERSION=$(jq -r .version package.json) && docker build -f ./linux/Dockerfile -t docdetective/docdetective:latest -t docdetective/docdetective:$PACKAGE_VERSION . --build-arg PACKAGE_VERSION=$PACKAGE_VERSION
scripts.push: PACKAGE_VERSION=$(jq -r .version package.json) && docker push docdetective/docdetective:latest && docker push docdetective/docdetective:$PACKAGE_VERSION

author: Manny Silva
